LanguageData.AnimalInsanitySingle: A local {0} has gone mad. It will attack everyone it sees.
LanguageData.AnimalInsanityMultiple: Some sort of psychic wave has swept over the landscape. Your colonists are okay, but...\n\nIt seems many of the {0}s in the area have been driven insane.
LanguageData.CropBlight: A mysterious blight has destroyed your crops.
LanguageData.EclipseIncident: One of the moons of this planet has orbited in front of the sun. An eclipse has begun.
LanguageData.EnemyRaidWalkIn: A group of {0} from {1} have arrived nearby.
LanguageData.EnemyRaidEdgeDrop: A group of {0} from {1} have arrived in drop pods nearby.
LanguageData.EnemyRaidCenterDrop: A group of {0} from {1} have dropped in right on top of you!
LanguageData.EnemyRaidStageThenAttack: They will prepare for a while, then attack.\n\nPrepare a defense or attack them pre-emptively.
LanguageData.EnemyRaidBesiege: It looks like they want to besiege the colony.
LanguageData.FriendlyRaidWalkIn: A group of friendly {0} from {1} have arrived nearby.
LanguageData.FriendlyRaidEdgeDrop: A group of friendly {0} from {1} have dropped in from orbit nearby.
LanguageData.FriendlyRaidCenterDrop: A group of friendly {0} from {1} have dropped from orbit right on top of you!
LanguageData.FriendlyRaidStageThenAttack: They will prepare for a while before moving in to help you.
LanguageData.FriendlyRaidImmediateAttack: They are moving in to help you immediately.
LanguageData.FriendlyRaidBesiege: It looks like they want to use siege tactics to help you.
LanguageData.RefugeePodCrash: You've detected an escape pod crashing hard nearby.\n\nIf anyone survived the impact, they'll be badly wounded.
LanguageData.CargoPodCrash: You have detected a cluster of cargo pods crashing nearby.\n\nPerhaps you'll find something useful in the wreckage.
LanguageData.ShortCircuit: A fault in {0} has caused a short circuit.\n\nAll {1} Wd of energy in the connected batteries has been discharged in an electrical explosion.
LanguageData.ShortCircuitWasLarge: This large amount of power has created an explosion of considerable size.
LanguageData.ShortCircuitWasHuge: That really is a huge explosion. Wow.
LanguageData.LetterSolarFlare:
A solar flare has begun.

The intense radiation will shut down all electrical devices.

It should pass in about a day.
LanguageData.LetterHeatWave: An unusual heat wave has begun. Watch out for heat stroke.
LanguageData.LetterColdSnap: An unusual cold snap has set in. Watch out for hypothermia and dying crops.
LanguageData.TraderArrival: A trade ship is passing nearby.\n\nThey are known as {0}. They are a {1}.
LanguageData.SingleTravelerPassing: A {0} from {1} is passing by. HECAP is named {2}.
LanguageData.GroupTravelersPassing: A group of travelers from {0} are passing by.
LanguageData.SingleVisitorArrives: A {0} from {1} is visiting the colony.\n\nHECAP is named {2}.
LanguageData.GroupVisitorsArrive: A group from {0} are visiting the colony.
LanguageData.WandererJoin: A {0} named NAME has arrived and is joining the colony. HECAP is a {1}.
LanguageData.SpaceshipPartCrash:
A large piece of an ancient ship has crashed nearby.

Your colonists can feel it in the back of their mind, exhorting unspeakable acts. It must have an onboard AI persona with psychic projection ability. And this AI is not friendly.

Destroy it as soon as possible.
LanguageData.MessageAnimalInsanityPulse: The ancient structure has emitted a psychic pulse that has driven nearby animals mad.
LanguageData.LetterShipPartDroveColonistInsane: The crashed ship part has emitted a focused psychic pulse that has driven colonist {0} insane.
LanguageData.LetterPsychicDroneLevelIncreased: The crashed ship part is now emanating a more powerful kind of psychic drone. Every humanoid in the area now feels more disturbed, terrified, and paranoid.
LanguageData.LetterAgentRevealed: {0} has been revealed as an agent of your enemy {1}.\n\nThey are attempting to escape now.
LanguageData.LetterIncidentPsychicDrone: Every colonist of the {0} gender winces in pain!\n\nSome distant engine of hatred is stirring. It is projecting a powerful psychic drone over this entire region, on a frequency that only seems to affect the {0} gender. For a few days, some people's mood will be quite a bit worse.
LanguageData.BeaversArrived: A group of hungry alphabeavers has just arrived.\n\nTry to eliminate them before they decimate every last tree in the region.

ItemStashSitePart_Manhunters: {0} says that there is a group of manhunting animals wandering nearby.
RefugeeChasedRejected: {0} screams in panic through the tinny speaker before you cut off the transmission.
RansomDemand: {1} contacts you on radio. They are holding former colonist {0} for ransom.\n\nThey're willing to release HIM back to you in exchange for {2} silver.
GroupVisitorsArriveTraderInfo: \n\nThey seem to have a few items to trade.
LetterAnimalSelfTameAndName: {0} has become tame. Colonists have decided to name it {1}.
LetterAnimalSelfTameAndNameNumerical: {0} has become tame. It is now designated {1}.
JourneyOffer:
A friendly AI from your past named Charlon Whitestone has sent you a message!

He reveals that he has a starship hidden on this planet, and sends you its world coordinates.

If you travel to the ship, Charlon will take you off this rim world, to the stars.
RefugeeChasedInitial:
A {1} named {0} calls you from nearby. HECAP is being chased by {2} from {3}!

HECAP begs for safety and offers to join your colony. Biologically, HE is {4} years old.

Be warned - if you accept, you'll have to fight off the {2} on HIS tail.
FriendlyRaidLeaderPresent: One of the {0} - {1}, is the leader of the faction.
SingleVisitorArrivesTraderInfo: \n\nHECAP seems to have a few items to trade.
CaravanDemand: Your caravan has been ambushed by a group of {1} {3} from {0}. They will attack unless you give them:\n\n{2}
ManhunterPackArrived:
A pack of man-hunting {0}s have entered the area. They will roam the region, hunting for humanoid flesh.

They can't pass doors, so if you stay behind walls you should be safe. They won't attack inactive turrets, so turn your turrets off if you want to save them.

They'll leave the area in a few days.
LetterIncidentPsychicSoothe: Every colonist of the {0} gender smiles with contentment!\n\nSome distant engine of happiness is stirring. It is projecting a powerful psychic drone over this entire region, on a frequency that only seems to affect the {0} gender. For a few days, some people's mood will be quite a bit better.
EnemyRaidLeaderPresent: One of the {0} - {1}, is the leader of the faction.
LetterFarmAnimalsWanderIn: A group of {0}s, abandoned or lost, have wandered into the area.\n\nThey seem accustomed to human contact and are joining the colony.
ItemStashQuestFeeDemand: {0} is willing to tell us the location of the stash in exchange for {1} silver.
ItemStashSitePart_Nothing: {0} says that the stash is unguarded.
LetterTraderCaravanArrival: A caravan from {0} is approaching. They are a {1}.\n\nThey will hang around the colony for a few days before leaving. You can attack them - but this will anger their faction!
ItemStashSitePart_Unknown: Unfortunately, {0} has no idea who or what - if anything - might be guarding the stash.
LetterBuildingBrokenDown: One of your machines ({0}) has broken down. It won't work until a colonist with the Construction work type goes and fixes it.
CaravanMeeting: Your caravan has met peacefully with a caravan from {0}. The other caravan is composed of:\n\n{1}
ItemStashSitePart_Turrets: {0} says that the stash is surrounded by enemy turrets.
ItemStashSitePart_Outpost: {0} says that there is an enemy outpost nearby.
SingleVisitorArrivesLeaderInfo: \n\nHECAP is the leader of the faction.
LetterThrumboPasses:
A small herd of thrumbos have wandered into the area.

Peaceful by nature, these rare creatures are extremely dangerous when confronted. Some traders are willing to pay a lot of money for their precious leather and horn.

Thrumbos will leave the area in a few days.
GroupVisitorsArriveLeaderInfo: \n\nOne of the visitors - {0}, is the leader of the faction.
